tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE PatientPrescriptions (
  patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  prescription_id UUID,
  medication_name TEXT,
  dosage TEXT,
  frequency TEXT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  is_adherent BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE prescriptions (
  prescription_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID,
  medication_name TEXT,
  dosage INTEGER,
  frequency TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE Patient ( patient_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  date_of_birth DATE NOT NULL,
  gender VARCHAR(10),
  phone_number VARCHAR(15) )

CREATE TABLE Prescription ( prescription_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID NOT NULL,
  doctor_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  prescription_date DATE NOT NULL,
  medication_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  dosage VARCHAR(20),
  instructions VARCHAR(100) )

CREATE TABLE MedicationAdherence ( adherence_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id UUID NOT NULL,
  prescription_id UUID NOT NULL,
  adherence_date DATE NOT NULL,
  adherence_time TIME NOT NULL,
  is_taken BOOLEAN NOT NULL )
CREATE TABLE patient (   patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,   patient_name VARCHAR(255),   date_of_birth DATE,   gender VARCHAR(10),   phone_number VARCHAR(20) );

CREATE TABLE prescription (   prescription_id INT PRIMARY KEY,   patient_id INT,   doctor_name VARCHAR(255),   medication_name VARCHAR(255),   dosage VARCHAR(50),   frequency VARCHAR(50),   start_date DATE,   end_date DATE,   FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patient(patient_id) );

CREATE TABLE medication_adherence (   adherence_id INT PRIMARY KEY,   patient_id INT,   prescription_id INT,   adherence_date DATE,   adherence_time TIME,   dose_taken BOOLEAN,   FOREIGN KEY (patient_id) REFERENCES patient(patient_id),   FOREIGN KEY (prescription_id) REFERENCES prescription(prescription_id) );
CREATE TABLE doctor (   doctor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,   doctor_name VARCHAR(255),   speciality VARCHAR(100),   hospital_name VARCHAR(255) );

CREATE TABLE patients(
  patient_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_name VARCHAR(255),
  birth_date DATE,
  gender ENUM('Male', 'Female'),
  address VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE doctors(
  doctor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  doctor_name VARCHAR(255),
  specialty VARCHAR(255),
  hospital VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE prescriptions(
  prescription_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  doctor_id INT,
  medication VARCHAR(255),
  dosage VARCHAR(50),
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  FOREIGN KEY(patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id),
  FOREIGN KEY(doctor_id) REFERENCES doctors(doctor_id)
)

CREATE TABLE medication_records(
  record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  medication VARCHAR(255),
  dosage VARCHAR(50),
  intake_time TIME,
  date DATE,
  adherence BOOLEAN,
  FOREIGN KEY(patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
)

CREATE TABLE medication_reminders(
  reminder_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  patient_id INT,
  reminder_time TIME,
  reminder_date DATE,
  message VARCHAR(255),
  FOREIGN KEY(patient_id) REFERENCES patients(patient_id)
)
